about_the_game:
All characters depicted in this game are 18 years of age or older.

STORY

Two hundred years passed, the Demon King came back to life again.
At the same time, the demons began to take advantage of the opportunity to riot. Thanks to the existence of adventurers, peace continued. But the Demon King is a threat after all.
The protagonist, blue-haired with a large sword, is a new adventurer, but he has the ability to destroy Warcraft alone. One day, because of the invitation of a mysterious voice, he embarked on the journey of crusading against the Demon King.
On the way to adventure, the protagonist meets demonic girls of different races one after another. Among them, there are many different characters, such as cat, Fox, and elf, and so on.
With the help of the heroines and other companions, can the protagonist defeat the Demon King?

FEATURES

  • Classic J-RPG
  • Heroine fondness system
  • Learn new skills during combat
  • Glasses ON/OFF for all heroines
  • All enemies can be turned into companions

content_descriptors.notes: Some scenes in the game will appear bare and sexually suggestive content and strong language that is not suitable for minors; Please decide whether to play or not.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 3+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
